entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as 'Harry' throughout the text.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: A wizard who sold wands, mentioned as one of the last ones ever sold.

entities.name: trevor
entities.description: A character who is being called back by another character.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: A character who is asking Harry about DA meetings and mentions enjoying them as a way to have friends.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A character who was removed by Harry, mentioned as the reason for not having DA meetings anymore.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A character who bumped his head against a seat and looked disappointed about the end of DA meetings.

relationships.description: Harry is not directly related to Ollivander, but it's mentioned that one of the last wands ever sold by Ollivander was shown to Harry.
Harry is calling back Trevor, who had dived under a seat to retrieve his toad.
Luna is asking Harry about DA meetings.
Harry removed Umbridge, which is mentioned as the reason for not having DA meetings anymore.
Luna spoke to Neville when he bumped his head against a seat.
